title: 장거의 아트워크
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/zhange-artwork/Secure-Contain-Protect-Art-page-ver|align=center|caption=확보. 격리. 보호. 재단 탄생 10주년 기념 선물.|width=700px]]

> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/forum/t-2063515/zhange-s-scp-art 환영합니다.] 이야기/허브 삽화에 대해 언제든지 문의하세요.
> 제 예술품들을 [https://www.redbubble.com/people/zhange Redbubble 상점]에서 프린트, 포스터, 티셔츠 등으로 구입할 수 있습니다!
> 최우수 작품은 ☆로 표시

**기념 아트위크**
[[collapsible show="☆ SCP 재단과 요주의 단체 (11주년) ☆" hide="- 변칙적이며 이성적인 것을, 악의적이며 이타적인 것을 보아라..." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=Groups%20of%20Interest.png|align=center|caption= [http://scpko.wikidot.com/groups-of-interest ... 이 우주의 웅장한 무대 위에 서 있는 배우들.]|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]


**SCP**
[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-001 ☆" hide="- 검은 달은 우는가? -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scpsandbox2.wdfiles.com/local--files/zhange/ZhangeSeriesI|align=center|caption=충돌하는 세상이 현실을 갈가리 찢고 우주가 신들과 싸울 때 최후를 엿볼 수 있다.|width=800px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-049 +" hide="- 흑사병 의사 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/aaGoFjG.jpg|align=center|caption=“제 치료법이 가장 효과적이랍니다.”|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 +" hide="- 십대 서큐버스 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/aa00a0ee3e78814b511fe7af8b5b3fe8/tumblr_p2n9eu7CqC1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="에덴은 장소가 아니란다. 상태를 말하는 거지.”|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-435 +" hide="- 어둠을-만드는-자 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=435.jpg|align=center|caption="No. It is his shadow."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-469 +" hide="- 날개가 많은 천사 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/NVxkdjC.jpg|align=center|caption="종소리가 울릴 때마다, 천사가 날개를 가진다."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-515 +" hide="- 슬리퍼 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/Lr2JY56.jpg|align=center|caption="Can you see where I am? Can you breathe? Can you move?"|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-963 +" hide="- 불멸 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/aMBsWai.jpg|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/the-executions-of-doctor-bright "There was one final execution for Doctor Bright that night."]|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@@@

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1338 +" hide="- 나무의 아이 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://pre05.deviantart.net/7ed8/th/pre/i/2017/189/c/e/scp_1338__child_of_trees__by_zhange000-dbflalx.jpg|align=center|caption="I’m trying to heal him."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-1730 ☆" hide="- 제13기지에 무슨 일이 일어났나? -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/c11b0f47b379275992d25e29a142c294/tumblr_p17hbeKFAt1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption=“마치 신과 같았고, 그들은 그걸 상자에 가뒀죠...”|width=800px]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@@@

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2217 +" hide="- 망치와 모루 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/FJaLYzR.jpg|align=center|caption="…대전쟁이 시작되리라"|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2226 +" hide="- 소멸 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=http://img02.deviantart.net/07f8/i/2017/106/8/e/scp_2226_by_zhange000-db60ah1.jpg|align=center|caption="For seven hours, the creature plays the instrument…"
|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2273 +" hide="- 붉은 군대 제22기갑보병사단 알렉세이 벨리트로프 소령 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/f45d6d45547d9e66378b23155d65873d/tumblr_oqyyuwBZDW1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="왜 그들과 함께 죽지 않았던 거지?"|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2396 +" hide="- 달콤 양 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/7020f0faa693b2833d7c68dd9071e7eb/tumblr_p2n93oSoro1w6i6mko2_r1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="W 박사님은 남자애들이 누나나 여동생의 장난감을 망가뜨리는 걸 싫어했어요.…걔넨 절 망가뜨릴 수 없어요."|width=500px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2481 +" hide="- 태양들을 죽여라 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/303214252ff2b43cb2b539552bc88c6e/tumblr_orsp5g3Iuf1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="The kings of Xia can now rest in peace!"|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2521 +" hide="- ●●|●●●●●|●●|● -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/PL6lAfV.jpg|align=center|caption=♥♥♥♥|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2599 +" hide="- 만족스럽지 못한 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://pre06.deviantart.net/b275/th/pre/i/2017/069/e/f/scp_2599__not_good_enough__by_zhange000-dayrnfa.jpg|align=center|caption="저…전 할 수 없어요!"|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2600 +" hide="- The Empty Box -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://orig00.deviantart.net/f7fd/f/2017/261/2/d/scp_2600_small_by_zhange000-dbnvy4v.gif|align=center|caption="There's too many of us to fit in. We can't get out alone or together."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2952 +" hide="- 국제지역민운송체계 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://pre10.deviantart.net/cd0f/th/pre/i/2017/064/a/f/scp_2952_by_zhange000-db199gz.jpg|align=center|caption="소비자 불만에 신속히 대응하고 완벽한 고객서비스까지 해 준 데 감사를 표하오."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2998 +" hide="- 변칙적 송신, 2485 메가헤르츠. -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://i.imgur.com/uHlwoFy.jpg|align=center|caption="저주받은 이는 자신의 범행 이전엔 루하라고 불렸다. 그는 이제 비명 밖에 지르지 못한다."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@@@

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3000 +" hide="- 아난타셰샤 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://pre05.deviantart.net/1b29/th/pre/i/2017/118/7/c/scp_3000__anantashesha__by_zhange000-db7e3w7.jpg|align=center|caption="그리고 오직 장어만이 남아있다."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-3001 ☆" hide="- 적색 현실 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/212df4c6380da7e734a2426086be605b/tumblr_osm8l8taJ31w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="5년, 11개월, 21일."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3002 +" hide="- 생각 암살 기도 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://img00.deviantart.net/416a/i/2017/257/2/8/scp_3002__attempts_to_assassinate_thought__by_zhange000-dbndgec.png|align=center|caption="예상했어야지."|width=500px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3003 +" hide="- 역사의 종언 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://66.media.tumblr.com/b64b2645a437389b213efcf3aeef4dd1/tumblr_p6faocjJ0h1w6i6mko1_1280.png|align=center|caption="난 자네들에게 일률적인 단 하나의 목적을 줄 수 있고, 거기서 벗어나고 싶다는 유혹을 없애줄 수 있네."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-3007 ☆" hide="- 두 예술가의 세계 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/zhange-artwork/ZhangeSeriesIV.png|align=center|caption="신을 죽인 예술가는 우리의 세상에 내려올 것이다."|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3377 +" hide="- Benevolent Wine Connoisseur -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/bef58fbb48ffb12d6f2a8c311c4d25df/tumblr_p3vr0ojMgs1w6i6mko1_1280.png|align=center|caption="At least once a month, one bottle of wine in each cellar must be removed and consumed by two members of Foundation staff alongside a meal of rare steak in a Bearnaise sauce, with freshly-fried potato."|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3560 +" hide="- All Robots Go To Limbo -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://img00.deviantart.net/3276/i/2018/075/9/e/scp_3560__all_robots_go_to_limbo__by_zhange000-dc5rj5d.png|align=center|caption="... It wouldn't bring me any peace."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3813 +" hide="- The Fall of Hyperion -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/document-3813-l/SCP-3813-P-75.jpg|align=center|caption="On he flared."|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3637 +" hide="- 이 사랑은 많은 물이 꺼치지 못하겠고 홍수라도 엄몰하지 못하나니 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://img00.deviantart.net/a230/i/2017/317/0/d/scp_3637__many_waters_cannot_quench_love__by_zhange000-dbtnub1.jpg|align=center|caption="SCP-3637-1은 둥지 옆에 웅크리고 앉아 돌이 된 알들에 코를 비비더니 소금 더미로 무너져 내렸다."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-3700 ☆" hide="- 전투조류 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/701d29216bbe7ce5b6a4d5fa4158bcd3/tumblr_p27mio0riB1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="마지막 한 방 준비!"|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3880 +" hide="- ILLEST RAIN SOUNDS ∞ Hours No Looping -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/93eb58cbfbbf75f33d339684c7a834b5/tumblr_p6faocjJ0h1w6i6mko3_1280.png|align=center|caption="I'll keep the flowers growing, the rivers flowing, the great winds blowing. All because I'm owing you the world."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ SCP-3999 ☆" hide="- 내게 일어나는 모든 일의 중심에 내가 있다 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/2a9c7d200913d5fe8ae973f438811928/tumblr_otljitx4Lz1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption=내가 쓴 건 이게 다다.|width=400px]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@@@

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4666 +" hide="- 율맨 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/intermediary/f/c710158e-5f99-46a6-a17a-1dcb17d6aa4a/dcvoamy-f940f2f4-3b8a-4005-a835-3e1709973e56.jpg|align=center|caption=그리고 밤이 끝나면 우릴 데려가요...|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

**이야기**
[[collapsible show="+ 쿨전 +" hide="- hide -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/b6c81dca2f3cbc31732e6be976a9b027/tumblr_oz8wp2tRCa1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="갓 태어난 새의 날개가 막 꺾였다"|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Lana Neal Sings the Blues +" hide="- for milton -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/7257328b27254f18583d66d2153b0ea3/tumblr_p6faocjJ0h1w6i6mko2_1280.png|align=center|caption="Through the regret, through the failures and the days gone by, the wounds that bleed in places where no one can see, he's got something to hold on to, and today, it'll do."|width=500px]]
[[/collapsible]]

**캐릭터**
[[collapsible show="+ 진 키류 +" hide="εїз" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/33d6a81fd8eea06d51df78df79841ec2/tumblr_ozx6idROKl1w6i6mko1_1280.png|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/snakes-and-ladders …진은 가치있음을 느꼈다. 의미 있는 일들이다.]|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="☆ 빈센트 앤더슨 ☆" hide="Everyone loves Anderson." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://68.media.tumblr.com/97429287602465dee969739c5a1111e3/tumblr_p2dhyztIea1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption=“I’m just trying to make sure that I fix as many mistakes as I can… “|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Dr Michael Magnus +" hide="and Helen" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/c223e208ee43aba7bf46e43e614422dc/tumblr_p3lrh9lbNm1w6i6mko1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption="Legends never die"|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@@@
[[collapsible show="☆ 타우-5 ‘윤회‘ ☆" hide="The PATH OF A GOD? THE PATH OF A WARRIOR?
 Or is there another way?" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://78.media.tumblr.com/c531db893bbceced105ed31fc9111712/tumblr_p4hz7pHJrA1w6i6mko1_1280.png|align=center|caption="The first embraced the darkness blissfully. The second succumbed without resistance. The third failed to remain conscious. The fourth died clutching her chest and writhing."|width=500px]]
[[/collapsible]]

**요주의 단체**

[[collapsible show="☆ 로버트 부마로 ☆" hide="- 부서진 신의 건설자 -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/intermediary/f/c710158e-5f99-46a6-a17a-1dcb17d6aa4a/dcyqh9r-b64d5ee1-ee62-4eeb-b99d-e89342c1f732.png|align=center|caption="The moon was once a piece of Earth... a scarred face in the night sky. And yet, it worked in perfect harmony with the planet. Broken pieces working together as one machine."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 메카네 +" hide="- No matter what we are, no matter what we seek to build..." hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://img03.deviantart.net/01ea/i/2017/125/7/3/mekhane__the_broken_god_by_zhange000-db02wlc.jpg|align=center|caption="... our purpose is to construct the Anvil..."|width=600px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ 부서진 신의 교단 ☆" hide="- 그리고 살덩이를 부숴라 -" hideLocation="both"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scpsandbox2.wdfiles.com/local--files/zhange/ZhangeGOI.png|align=center|caption= 동일하고 신성한 원인으로 부서진 명령. 외부인들에게는 이들의 장대한 희망과 재조립에 대한 노력들이 쓸모없어 보이겠지만, 살덩이가 나타난다면 교단은 단결하고 부서지지 않으리라.|width=800px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="☆ 사르킥 숭배의 카르시스트들 ☆" hide="- our paradise draws near" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://orig00.deviantart.net/6adf/f/2018/248/d/2/the_karcists_of_sarkicism_by_zhange000-dcm2uff.jpg|align=center|caption=And with our own flesh shall we birth it.|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

**배너 및 디자인**

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4000 경연 +" hide="- 이전에서 온 모든 것." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name= https://78.media.tumblr.com/7bc78b01cc582339e9a942e9506610df/tumblr_pangq9tsNS1w6i6mko2_r1_1280.jpg|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/scp4000contesthub 가서 역사를 창조해 보세요.]|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 최후의 날 +" hide="- 종말이 시작된다." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name= https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/357371495518830593/437235909390499840/Doomsday_banner_2.jpg|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/doomsday-contest 정상성은 무너질 것이다.]|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 최후의 날: 신격화 +" hide="- Apotheosis is not the origin of the major man." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name= http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/apotheosis-hub/Zhange.jpg|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/apotheosis-hub "An epic tale of Endings, Beginnings, and the oft-forgotten toil in between."]|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 최후의 날: 죽음 +" hide="- ... and even death may die." hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name= http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/end-of-death-hub/big.png|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/end-of-death-hub "ΩK급 시나리오란 모든 생명체에게 불멸이 강제되는 상황을 말한다..."]|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 모든 반짝이는 것이 +" hide="- 금은 아니다. -" hideLocation="top"]]
[[include component:image-block name= http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/drchandra-s-sandbox/mcd_banner_2_by_zhange000-dciw1qb.jpg|align=center|caption=[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/all-that-glisters Providing a gateway to another world.]|width=700px]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[/=]]
author: Salamander724
